Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Methods
Deprecated Methods
org.apache.ddlutils.Platform.alterTables(Connection, Database, boolean)
          Use Platform.alterModel(Connection, Database, Database, boolean) together with Platform.readModelFromDatabase(Connection, String) instead. 
org.apache.ddlutils.Platform.alterTables(Connection, Database, CreationParameters, boolean)
          Use Platform.alterModel(Connection, Database, Database, CreationParameters, boolean) together with Platform.readModelFromDatabase(Connection, String) instead. 
org.apache.ddlutils.Platform.alterTables(Connection, String, String, String[], Database, boolean)
          Use Platform.alterModel(Connection, Database, Database, boolean) together with Platform.readModelFromDatabase(Connection, String, String, String, String[]) instead. 
org.apache.ddlutils.Platform.alterTables(Connection, String, String, String[], Database, CreationParameters, boolean)
          Use Platform.alterModel(Connection, Database, Database, CreationParameters, boolean) together with Platform.readModelFromDatabase(Connection, String, String, String, String[]) instead. 
org.apache.ddlutils.Platform.alterTables(Database, boolean)
          Use Platform.alterModel(Database, Database, boolean) together with Platform.readModelFromDatabase(String) instead. 
org.apache.ddlutils.Platform.alterTables(Database, CreationParameters, boolean)
          Use Platform.alterModel(Database, Database, CreationParameters, boolean) together with Platform.readModelFromDatabase(String) instead. 
org.apache.ddlutils.Platform.alterTables(String, String, String[], Database, boolean)
          Use Platform.alterModel(Database, Database, boolean) together with Platform.readModelFromDatabase(String, String, String, String[]) instead. 
org.apache.ddlutils.Platform.alterTables(String, String, String[], Database, CreationParameters, boolean)
          Use Platform.alterModel(Database, Database, CreationParameters, boolean) together with Platform.readModelFromDatabase(String, String, String, String[]) instead. 
org.apache.ddlutils.Platform.createTables(Connection, Database, boolean, boolean)
          Use Platform.createModel(Connection, Database, boolean, boolean) instead. 
org.apache.ddlutils.Platform.createTables(Connection, Database, CreationParameters, boolean, boolean)
          Use Platform.createModel(Connection, Database, CreationParameters, boolean, boolean) instead. 
org.apache.ddlutils.Platform.createTables(Database, boolean, boolean)
          Use Platform.createModel(Database, boolean, boolean) instead. 
org.apache.ddlutils.Platform.createTables(Database, CreationParameters, boolean, boolean)
          Use Platform.createModel(Database, CreationParameters, boolean, boolean) instead. 
org.apache.ddlutils.platform.JdbcModelReader.determineSchemaOf(Connection, String, Table)
          Will be removed once full schema support is in place 
org.apache.ddlutils.Platform.dropTables(Connection, Database, boolean)
          Use Platform.dropModel(Connection, Database, boolean) instead. 
org.apache.ddlutils.Platform.dropTables(Database, boolean)
          Use Platform.dropModel(Database, boolean) instead. 
org.apache.ddlutils.Platform.getAlterTablesSql(Connection, Database)
          Use Platform.getAlterModelSql(Database, Database) together with Platform.readModelFromDatabase(Connection, String) instead. 
org.apache.ddlutils.Platform.getAlterTablesSql(Connection, Database, CreationParameters)
          Use Platform.getAlterModelSql(Database, Database, CreationParameters) together with Platform.readModelFromDatabase(Connection, String) instead. 
org.apache.ddlutils.Platform.getAlterTablesSql(Connection, String, String, String[], Database)
          Use Platform.getAlterModelSql(Database, Database) together with Platform.readModelFromDatabase(Connection, String, String, String, String[]) instead. 
org.apache.ddlutils.Platform.getAlterTablesSql(Connection, String, String, String[], Database, CreationParameters)
          Use Platform.getAlterModelSql(Database, Database, CreationParameters) together with Platform.readModelFromDatabase(Connection, String, String, String, String[]) instead. 
org.apache.ddlutils.Platform.getAlterTablesSql(Database)
          Use Platform.getAlterModelSql(Database, Database) together with Platform.readModelFromDatabase(String) instead. 
org.apache.ddlutils.Platform.getAlterTablesSql(Database, CreationParameters)
          Use Platform.getAlterModelSql(Database, Database, CreationParameters) together with Platform.readModelFromDatabase(String) instead. 
org.apache.ddlutils.Platform.getAlterTablesSql(String, String, String[], Database)
          Use Platform.getAlterModelSql(Database, Database) together with Platform.readModelFromDatabase(String, String, String, String[]) instead. 
org.apache.ddlutils.Platform.getAlterTablesSql(String, String, String[], Database, CreationParameters)
          Use Platform.getAlterModelSql(Database, Database, CreationParameters) together with Platform.readModelFromDatabase(String, String, String, String[]) instead. 
org.apache.ddlutils.Platform.getCreateTablesSql(Database, boolean, boolean)
          Use Platform.getCreateModelSql(Database, boolean, boolean) instead. 
org.apache.ddlutils.Platform.getCreateTablesSql(Database, CreationParameters, boolean, boolean)
          Use Platform.getCreateModelSql(Database, CreationParameters, boolean, boolean) instead. 
org.apache.ddlutils.Platform.getDropTablesSql(Database, boolean)
          Use Platform.getDropModelSql(Database) instead. 
org.apache.ddlutils.io.DatabaseIO.isUseInternalDtd()
          Switched to XML schema, and the internal XML schema should always be used 
org.apache.ddlutils.io.DatabaseDataIO.setDetermineSchema(boolean)
          Will be removed once proper schema support is in place 
org.apache.ddlutils.task.WriteDataToFileCommand.setDetermineSchema(boolean)
          Will be removed once proper schema support is in place 
org.apache.ddlutils.io.DatabaseDataIO.setSchemaPattern(String)
          Will be removed once proper schema support is in place 
org.apache.ddlutils.io.DatabaseIO.setUseInternalDtd(boolean)
          Switched to XML schema, and the internal XML schema should always be used
